text: Type 21 can refer to: * Type 21 frigate, or Amazon-class frigate, a late-20th- century escort vessel of the Royal Navy. * Type 021-class missile boat, a Chinese missile-firing naval vessel first produced in about 1975, and still in production. * Type XXI submarine, a German technologically advanced submarine produced in 1945. * Type 21 Radar, a radar of the Imperial Japanese Navy
title: Type 21
